channel.title: Book Review on Blake Niemyjski
channel.description: Recent content in Book Review on Blake Niemyjski

item.title: Beginning Silverlight 4 in C#
item.description: I have read many technical books over the years and this is one is one of those books that you know you better keep handy. I really like how Robert has this book laid out and how he introduces you to Silverlight. I’ve been a .NET guy since version 1.0. But like most developers, I haven’t had the chance to really dive into Microsoft’s latest technologies like Silverlight until they have a few versions released.
